constructor-arg.value: select * from T_SO_PICKUPINFO where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)

select * from T_SO_PICKUPINFO where
lifecycle !=2
#if($orderId) and ORDER_ID=:orderId #end
#if($country) and COUNTRY=:country #end
#if($province) and PROVINCE=:province #end
#if($city) and CITY=:city #end
#if($district) and DISTRICT=:district #end
#if($town) and TOWN=:town #end
#if($address) and ADDRESS=:address #end
#if($zipCode) and ZIPCODE=:zipCode #end
#if($contact) and CONTACT=:contact #end
#if($contactPhone) and CONTACT_PHONE=:contactPhone #end
#if($contactMobile) and CONTACT_MOBILE=:contactMobile #end
#if($modifyTime) and MODIFY_TIME >= :modifyTimeStart #end #if($modifyTime) and MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeEnd #end
#if($version) and VERSION >= :versionStart #end #if($version) and VERSION <= :versionEnd #end
#if($createTime) and CREATE_TIME >= :createTimeStart #end #if($createTime) and CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeEnd #end
#if($bsOrdercode) and BS_ORDER_CODE=:bsOrdercode #end
#if($lifecycle) and LIFECYCLE=:lifecycle #end #if($lifecycle) and lifecycle =:lifecycle #end
update T_SO_PICKUPINFO set lifecycle=:state where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)
update T_SO_PICKUPINFO set lifecycle=2 where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)
